ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How did you play when you were 15th?
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is a tip from someone on this list from long time ago - When you move items, look at the tip of your mouse pointer NOT at the item (its lagged a bit
ygData.messageBody:
Here is a tip from someone on this list from long time ago -

When you move items, look at the tip of your mouse pointer NOT at the item
(its lagged a bit behind the tip of the arrorw.) Put the tip of the arrow
into the center of the box and the item wil ldrop right in. If you look at
the item and put it over a box, the pointer can easily be in the cracks or
outside the box and oppsie, your item drops - and sometimes (poofs).

Rangers seem to get the blues right about where you are. Guk and Solb -
sigh. Dogs and frogs - lots and lots.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Scott Malin" <Thanos0000@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 9:58 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How did you play when you were 15th?


> > Reedwind -- Welcome!!!!
> Thanks


> This I'm not so good at I'm afraid. I need some practice I imagine. My
> problem, and I'm sure this doesn't come as any surprise, is dropping my
> instruments.


> I can only dream of getting a character to 50 now, 11 levels to go with my
> ranger but he's running into hard times.
